Title: Pepepérez and Rosario Solano present Monday
Description: Pepepérez and Rosario Solano present LUNES in Cortelazor: a music and storytelling performance about everyday neighborhood life. World premiere on July 25 at La Mano Verde.
Keywords: Pepepérez, Rosario Solano, LUNES, Cortelazor show, music storytelling, La Mano Verde concert, cultural event Cortelazor, July 2025, theater and music, Sierra de Aracena culture
